item.title: [ Please help ] Error in complier, caused by Commands
item.dc:creator: @Weatherby Weatherby
item.description:
@Weatherby wrote:

[quote=“ohokay, post:4, topic:460476”][/quote]
I added

[code]public void DonatorCommands(Client c, String playerCommand)
{

}
}[/code]
the two } but then it gave me 1OO errors…

This is from what’s above & below

[code]}
if (Config.SERVER_DEBUG)
Misc.println(c.playerName+" playerCommand: "+playerCommand);

if (c.playerRights >= 0)
    playerCommands(c, playerCommand);
if (c.playerRights == 1 || c.playerRights == 2 || c.playerRights == 3)
    moderatorCommands(c, playerCommand);
if (c.playerRights == 2 || c.playerRights == 3)
    administratorCommands(c, playerCommand);
if (c.playerRights == 3)
    ownerCommands(c, playerCommand);
    if (c.playerRights == 4)
    DonatorCommands(c, playerCommand);
                   
}

public void playerCommands(Client c, String playerCommand)
{

if(playerCommand.startsWith("withdraw")) {
	String[] cAmount = playerCommand.split(" ");
	int amount = Integer.parseInt(cAmount[1]);
	if (c.inWild()) {
		c.sendMessage("You cannot do this in the wilderness");
		c.getPA().sendFrame126(""+c.MoneyCash+"", 8135); 
		return;
	}[/code]

And Now, when I try to run the server

I get this…

    if (Config.SERVER_DEBUG)
        Misc.println(c.playerName+" playerCommand: "+playerCommand);
    
    if (c.playerRights >= 0)
        playerCommands(c, playerCommand);
    if (c.playerRights == 1 || c.playerRights == 2 || c.playerRights == 3)

    if (c.playerRights == 2 || c.playerRights == 3)
        administratorCommands(c, playerCommand);
    if (c.playerRights == 3)
        ownerCommands(c, playerCommand);
        if (c.playerRights == 4)
        DonatorCommands(c, playerCommand);
                       
    }

   
    public void playerCommands(Client c, String playerCommand)
    {

thats what this looks like.[/quote]

    public void DonatorCommands(Client c, String playerCommand)
    {
        
}
}

Check above there and see if you’re anything missing.

item.title: [ Please help ] Error in complier, caused by Commands
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

I think there’s a bracket missing, possible above that method, or there is one too many. I get confused with that but that’s probably the issue.

		}
    if (Config.SERVER_DEBUG)
        Misc.println(c.playerName+" playerCommand: "+playerCommand);
    
    if (c.playerRights >= 0)
        playerCommands(c, playerCommand);
    if (c.playerRights == 1 || c.playerRights == 2 || c.playerRights == 3) 
        moderatorCommands(c, playerCommand);
    if (c.playerRights == 2 || c.playerRights == 3) 
        administratorCommands(c, playerCommand);
    if (c.playerRights == 3) 
        ownerCommands(c, playerCommand);
        if (c.playerRights == 4) 
        DonatorCommands(c, playerCommand);
			
    }

    
    public void playerCommands(Client c, String playerCommand)

That’s how it should look PI

item.title: [ Please help ] Error in complier, caused by Commands
item.dc:creator: @Weatherby Weatherby
item.description:
@Weatherby wrote:

Hi, When I compile I get errors about Donator commands, but unsure how to fix.

My Complier:

if (c.playerRights >= 0) playerCommands(c, playerCommand); if (c.playerRights == 1 || c.playerRights == 2 || c.playerRights == 6 || c.playerRights == 3) moderatorCommands(c, playerCommand); if (c.playerRights == 2 || c.playerRights == 6 || c.playerRights == 3) administratorCommands(c, playerCommand); if (c.playerRights == 3 || c.playerRights == 6) ownerCommands(c, playerCommand); if (c.playerRights == 4) DonatorCommands(c, playerCommand);

The DonatorCommands(c,playercommand); is the error, how do I fix this?
Please help me, thank you!

Read full topic
item.source: [ Please help ] Error in complier, caused by Commands
